product_name: REI Camp Bed 3.5 Self-Inflating Pad - Special Buy
long_description: With an ultra-cushy 3.5-inch thickness and soft, stretch-fabric top surface, the REI Camp Bed 3.5 Self-Inflating Pad provides plush sleeping comfort wherever you decide to rest. Horizontally cored foam is engineered to be lightweight and compressible without compromising warmth. Dual quick-closing, high-volume-airflow valves allow the pad to self-inflate and deflate quickly. Durable 150-denier polyester bottom surface resists wear. R-value equals 6.0; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). The REI Camp Bed 3.5 Self-Inflating Pad includes a stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: With an ultra-cushy 3.5-inch thickness and soft, stretch-fabric top surface, the REI Camp Bed 3.5 Self-Inflating Pad provides plush sleeping comfort wherever you decide to rest.
